page.title: 13Farming
page.content: There are four farms in our block which grow mixed crops and also breed or fatten cattle. The{soil}is of various kinds, consisting of clay, strong and light loam,and sand links. The{crops}grown on the local farms are barley, potatoes, turnips and arable silage. The{crops}are sown in spring (March _ April) and also after the harvest{crops}are grown in Autumn (August _ september ). The{crops}that one local farmer might introduce in the near{future}are flax,which was grown in this area last century, maize and lupins.This is because the climate is changing and there is more demand for these{crops. and less demand for barley. The farmer has approx'600 acres of arable land.
